Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #71 buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial. 

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to utility maintenance at Commercial/103rd.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Northbound Reroute near State/64th
ShortDescription: Northbound 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, 67th, Wentworth, 63rd and State due to, street blockage near State/64th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, 67th, Wentworth, 63rd and State due to, street blockage near State/64th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
